description:
The Nexus Jacket is made using Thermic™ stretch fleece for freedom of movement when hiking or climbing. With low bulk seams that allow easy layering and movement under a shell it has a regular fit. The fabric is soft and comfortable, while the YKK® front zip, two YKK® zipped hand pockets, and close fit under helmet hood helps you stay warm on chillier days.

If you’re tackling Swirral Edge or Scafell Pike, the Nexus Jacket is the perfect partner. Hard-wearing, stretchy and comfortable, it’s your go-to lightweight technical fleece.
name: Rab Nexus Jacket - Mens
